form.label: Asset Priority
form.description: Used to adjust or set priorities for assets

search.query: | inputlookup threathunting_asset_priority.csv | append [ stats count | eval host_fqdn= lower("$input_host_fqdn$") | eval priority = "$input_priority$" | eval temp_dt = now() | eval added_date = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | fields - _raw _time count | table * | join type=outer [| rest /services/authentication/current-context/context | fields username | where username!="splunk-system-user" | rename username AS contact]] | sort -temp_dt | dedup host_fqdn | fields - temp_dt | sort - date_added | eval mode = "$input_mode$" | eval delete=if(mode="delete" and host_fqdn=lower("$input_host_fqdn$"), "yes", "no") | where delete="no" | fields - delete mode | outputlookup threathunting_asset_priority.csv

html.div:
To integrate this asset priority with your Assets within Enterprise Security, please add the code below to your LDAPSearch code after you gather the assets.
| join type=left dns
[ `threathunting_assets_dns` ]
To use this lookup with searches from the Threat Hunting app, you can copy the command below and add it to any searches with a host_fqdn field and it will give you a field called priority.
| lookup threathunting_asset_priority_lookup host_fqdn OUTPUT priority

search.query: | inputlookup threathunting_asset_priority.csv | sort -added_date | fields added_date contact host_fqdn priority
